Berlinski zid
07 Nov 2019, 18:07 by Zlatica Kasal

30. obletnico padca Berlinskega zidu bo TV kanal Viasat History obeležil s premiernim predvajanjem letos posnetega dokumentarca o omenjenem dogodku. V soboto ob 21. uri.



Prizor iz dokumentarnega filma  

Zgodovinski dokumentarec z izvirnim naslovom Countdown: The Rise and Fall of the Berlin Wall - Izgradnja in padec Berlinskega zidu bodo televizijski gledalci lahko spremljali v dveh delih. Dokumentarec združuje osebna pričevanja z razlago najpomembnejših dogodkov, ki so vodili ta dva ključna zgodovinska dogodka, ter tako 30 let po padcu zidu ponuja nov in predvsem drugačen pogled na zgodovino hladne vojne. Dnevniki in pisma prič iz tistega časa razkrivajo zelo osebne poglede na dogodke - velike zaplete, preobrate in vseprisoten vihar čustev. Oba dogodka sta ljudi močno presenetila, zdelo se je, kot bi se vse skupaj odvilo čez noč. Zgodovinarji in strokovnjaki bodo posamezne zgodbe pojasnili s komentarji in dopolnili s kontekstom.
text:
Berlin wall
07 Nov 2019, 17:07 by Zlatica Kasal

The 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall will be marked by the TV channel Viasat History with the premiere of this year's documentary about the event. On Saturday at 9pm.



A scene from a documentary

A historical documentary titled Countdown: The Rise and Fall of the Berlin Wall - The Construction and Fall of the Berlin Wall will be able to be watched by TV viewers in two parts. The documentary combines personal testimony with an explanation of the major events that led these two key historical events, and thus, 30 years after the fall of the wall, offers a new and, above all, different view of Cold War history. The diaries and letters of witnesses of that time reveal very personal views of events - great complications, turnarounds and a pervasive storm of emotions. Both events surprised people greatly, it seemed as if everything had taken place overnight. Historians and experts will explain individual stories with commentary and supplement with context.
